name: Grave Chase
description: GRAVE CHASE is a retro-inspired 2D horror action-adventure game in which a brother & sister must survive the month of October in the deadly graveyard of a ghoulish groundskeeper. An all new game from the creator of ABOBO'S BIG ADVENTURE and BIONIC CHAINSAW POGO GORILLA!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 or later Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 mb video memory, shader model 3.0+ DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 150 MB available space Additional Notes: Gamepad highly recommended.
